name: above
trans: Higher than something; over it.

name: afraid
trans: Feeling scared or worried about something.

name: animal
trans: A living creature that is not a plant or human.

name: basket
trans: A container made of woven material used to carry things.

name: birthday
trans: The day you were born; celebrated each year.

name: brother
trans: A boy who has the same parents as you.

name: candy
trans: Sweet food made with sugar that tastes good.

name: circle
trans: A round shape with no corners.

name: clothes
trans: Things you wear on your body like shirts, pants, and dresses.

name: country
trans: A large area of land with its own government and people.

name: danger
trans: A situation where someone could get hurt.

name: doctor
trans: A person who helps sick or hurt people get better.

name: early
trans: Before the usual or expected time; near the beginning.

name: eight
trans: The number 8.

name: family
trans: People who are related to you, like parents, brothers, and sisters.

name: father
trans: A male parent; your dad.

name: giant
trans: Something or someone that is very, very big.

name: happy
trans: Feeling joy and pleasure; not sad.

name: inside
trans: In or into a building or container; not outside.

name: jungle
trans: A thick forest in a hot place with many plants and wild animals.

name: kind
trans: Nice and caring toward others.

name: laugh
trans: To make sounds that show you think something is funny.

name: market
trans: A place where people buy and sell food and other things.

name: number
trans: A word or symbol that shows how many, like 1, 2, 3.

name: outside
trans: Not inside a building; in the open air.

name: parent
trans: A mother or father; someone who takes care of a child.

name: quick
trans: Fast; done in a short time.

name: reason
trans: The explanation for why something happens or is done.

name: school
trans: A place where children go to learn.

name: sister
trans: A girl who has the same parents as you.

name: teacher
trans: A person who helps students learn at school.

name: under
trans: Below or beneath something.

name: village
trans: A small town in the country with houses and shops.

name: window
trans: An opening in a wall with glass that lets light in.

name: yellow
trans: A bright color like the sun or a banana.

name: zero
trans: The number that means none or nothing; 0.

name: around
trans: On all sides of something; in a circle.

name: between
trans: In the middle of two things.

name: carry
trans: To hold something and move it from one place to another.

name: decide
trans: To make up your mind about something; to choose.

name: enjoy
trans: To like something and have fun doing it.

name: finish
trans: To complete something; to reach the end.

name: garden
trans: A piece of ground where you grow flowers, fruits, or vegetables.

name: hill
trans: A raised area of land that is smaller than a mountain.

name: idea
trans: A thought or plan in your mind.

name: jacket
trans: A short coat that you wear over your clothes.

name: kitchen
trans: The room where food is cooked.

name: learn
trans: To get new knowledge or skills by studying or practicing.

name: money
trans: Coins and paper bills used to buy things.

name: never
trans: Not ever; at no time.

name: ocean
trans: A very large area of salty water.

name: people
trans: More than one person; human beings.

name: quiet
trans: Making little or no noise.

name: river
trans: A large stream of water that flows through the land.

name: sound
trans: Something you hear with your ears.

name: table
trans: A piece of furniture with a flat top and legs.

name: uncle
trans: The brother of your mother or father.

name: voice
trans: The sound you make when you speak or sing.

name: water
trans: A clear liquid that we drink and that fills rivers and oceans.

name: young
trans: Not old; in the early part of life.

name: zebra
trans: An animal that looks like a horse with black and white stripes.

name: alone
trans: By yourself; with no one else around.

name: before
trans: Earlier in time; happening first.

name: center
trans: The middle point or part of something.

name: dream
trans: Pictures and thoughts in your mind while you sleep.

name: everyone
trans: Every person; all people.

name: friend
trans: Someone you like and who likes you; a pal.

name: great
trans: Very good or wonderful.

name: helpful
trans: Willing to help others; useful.

name: island
trans: Land that is surrounded by water on all sides.

name: joy
trans: A feeling of great happiness.

name: knife
trans: A tool with a sharp blade used for cutting.

name: little
trans: Small in size; not big.

name: morning
trans: The early part of the day, from when you wake up until noon.

name: night
trans: The time when it is dark outside and most people sleep.

name: open
trans: To move something so you can see or go through it; not closed.

name: place
trans: A spot or location; somewhere you can be.

name: queen
trans: A woman who rules a country or is married to a king.

name: rain
trans: Water that falls from clouds in the sky.

name: snow
trans: White frozen water that falls from the sky in winter.

name: today
trans: This day; the day we are in now.

name: until
trans: Up to the time when something happens.

name: visit
trans: To go to see someone or a place.

name: world
trans: The Earth and all the people and places on it.

name: x-ray
trans: A special picture that shows the inside of your body, like your bones.

name: your
trans: Belonging to you.

name: about
trans: On the subject of; concerning something.

name: because
trans: For the reason that; telling why something happens.

name: child
trans: A young boy or girl.

name: door
trans: Something you open and close to go in and out of a room or building.

name: even
trans: Flat and smooth; or used to emphasize something surprising.

name: floor
trans: The surface you walk on inside a building.

name: green
trans: A color like grass and leaves.

name: house
trans: A building where people live.

name: important
trans: Something that matters a lot and is very special.

name: join
trans: To become part of a group or to connect things together.

name: keep
trans: To continue to have something; not to give it away.

name: love
trans: A very strong feeling of caring about someone or something.

name: music
trans: Sounds made by singing or playing instruments that are nice to hear.

name: new
trans: Something that has just been made or bought; not old.
